attributes.title: Stinky Dragon Adventures - Teaser Trailer
attributes.caption:
When the world needs saving, who ya gonna call?
These four interns!
Adapted from the podcast, Tales from the Stinky Dragon, our new show Stinky Dragon Adventures premieres November 9th on stinkydragonpod.com! Make sure to tune in!
attributes.description:
When the world needs saving, who ya gonna call?
These four interns!
Adapted from the podcast, Tales from the Stinky Dragon, our new show Stinky Dragon Adventures premieres November 9th on stinkydragonpod.com! Make sure to tune in!

attributes.title: Who Will Be The Next Infinight Intern? | Episode 1
attributes.caption: Embark on an enchanting adventure with Bart, Gum Gum, Kyborg, and Mudd as they compete to see who among them will become the next intern to the world’s greatest heroes, The Infinights.
attributes.description:
Embark on an enchanting adventure with Bart, Gum Gum, Kyborg, and Mudd as they compete to see who among them will become the next intern to the world’s greatest heroes, The Infinights. 

If you are seeking more adventures with The Infinights, check out Tales from the Stinky Dragon, the original podcast that inspired Stinky Dragon Adventures.

And if you like the show and want to support us please consider signing up for our patronage at Support us at stinkydragonpod.com/first . Your contributions make this show possible and your FIRST membership grants you an ad-free experience as well as access to additional bonus content. We love you.
attributes.display_title: Who Will Be The Next Infinight Intern? | Episode 1

attributes.title: Show Me the Magic: The Making of Stinky Dragon Adventures - Episode 1
attributes.caption: Ever wonder what goes into making a cinematic PUPPET show? Join our Writers and Director's, Blaine Gibson and Chris Demarais, as well as special guest Bart, as they do a deep dive on the making of the show, and provide commentary on the premiere episode of Stinky Dragon Adventures!
attributes.description: Ever wonder what goes into making a cinematic PUPPET show? Join our Writers and Director's, Blaine Gibson and Chris Demarais, as well as special guest Bart, as they do a deep dive on the making of the show, and provide commentary on the premiere episode of Stinky Dragon Adventures!
attributes.display_title: Show Me the Magic: The Making of Stinky Dragon Adventures - Episode 1

attributes.title: The Horrors of Catawampus | Episode 2
attributes.caption: Deep in the heart of Castle Catawampus Bart, Gum Gum, Kyborg, and Mudd find themselves in the clutches of chaos. Will the interns be able to escape this crucible of cruelty?
attributes.description:
Deep in the heart of Castle Catawampus Bart, Gum Gum, Kyborg, and Mudd find themselves in the clutches of chaos. Will the interns be able to escape this crucible of cruelty?

attributes.title: Show Me the Magic: The Making of Stinky Dragon Adventures - Episode 2
attributes.caption: How did we create a magic mirror? What was our favorite dungeon torture scene? Come behind the scenes with the cast & crew of Stinky Dragon Adventures as they discuss Episode 2!
attributes.description: Go behind the scenes of Stinky Dragon Adventures EPISODE 2 with Director & Writer Blaine Gibson, Lead Puppeteer Barbara Dunkelman, and special guest Gum Gum! How did we make Catawampus appear in a magic mirror? What shot made us want to pull our hair out? Find out in this behind the scenes look at the making of the show!
attributes.display_title: Show Me the Magic: The Making of Stinky Dragon Adventures - Episode 2

attributes.title: Orphan Uprising | Episode 3
attributes.caption: The Orphans have revolted and now it’s up to Bart, Gum Gum, Kyborg, and Mudd to restore order. Will our interns find peace or will the whole thing blow up in their faces?
attributes.description:
The Orphans have revolted and now it’s up to Bart, Gum Gum, Kyborg, and Mudd to restore order. Will our interns find peace or will the whole thing blow up in their faces?

attributes.title: Show Me the Magic: The Making of Stinky Dragon Adventures - Episode 3
attributes.caption: Go behind the scenes of Stinky Dragon Adventures EPISODE 3, The Orphan Uprising, with Director & Writer Chris Demarais, Barbara Dunkelman, and special guest Kyborg! Which episode was this originally supposed to be? Did someone really get to direct Timothee Chalamet? Find out in this behind the scenes look at the making of the show!

attributes.title: The New Heroes in Town | Episode 4
attributes.caption: As flying monkeys wreak havoc on Boulderay, there’s only one team of heroes capable of restoring order – the Everguards! Will Bart, Gum Gum, Kyborg and Mudd cooperate with these new heroes or is it time for the Everguards to go?
attributes.description:
As flying monkeys wreak havoc on Boulderay, there’s only one team of heroes capable of restoring order – the Everguards! Will Bart, Gum Gum, Kyborg and Mudd cooperate with these new heroes or is it time for the Everguards to go?

attributes.title: Show Me the Magic: The Making of Stinky Dragon Adventures - Episode 4
attributes.caption: We dive into the making of Stinky Dragon Adventures Episode 4, and discuss our favorite visual scene, flying monkeys, how we used Unreal Engine, and so much more!
attributes.description: Go behind the scenes on Episode 4 of Stinky Dragon Adventures with Director/Writer/Kyborg Blaine Gibson, our associate producer, gaffer, and assistant puppeteer Cody Hawkins, and Gum Gum (and his duck). How many flying monkeys did we actually have? How did we make the town look so big?  What was our favorite scene to shoot? We dive into it all on this episode of Show Me The Magic!
attributes.display_title: Show Me the Magic: The Making of Stinky Dragon Adventures - Episode 4

attributes.title: Mudd’s Catastrophe | Episode 5
attributes.caption: Mudd has changed into a cat and can’t change back! Will Mudd overcome his performance anxiety or is this whole thing a cat-astrophe?
attributes.description:
Mudd has changed into a cat and can’t change back! Will Mudd overcome his performance anxiety or is this whole thing a cat-astrophe? 

If you are seeking more adventures, check out Tales from the Stinky Dragon, the original podcast that inspired Stinky Dragon Adventures.

And if you like the show and want to support us please consider signing up for our patronage at stinkydragonpod.com/first. Your contributions make this show possible and your FIRST membership grants you an ad-free experience as well as access to additional bonus content. We love you.

attributes.title: Show Me the Magic: The Making of Stinky Dragon Adventures - Episode 5
attributes.caption: Blaine & Chris are joined by our production designer Ash Schmidt and Mudd himself to talk about what went into making episode 5 of Stinky Dragon Adventures! What was the strategy with making the sets? How were Rat King and Frog Man created? FIND OUT!
attributes.description: Come behind the scenes of Episode 5 of Stinky Dragon Adventures with writers & directors, Chris Demarais and Blaine Gibson, lead fabricator & production designer Ash Schmidt, and Mudd himself! Learn how we put sets together, how hard it was to puppet a tiny cat, how we managed to shoot down a well, and how we created RAT KING!
attributes.display_title: Show Me the Magic: The Making of Stinky Dragon Adventures - Episode 5

attributes.title: Flowers for Gum Gum | Episode 6
attributes.caption: After Gum Gum drinks a Potion of Intelligence, he  instantly becomes a genius, the effects seemingly permanent.  But when a powerful dragon attacks the city, will he be able to come up with a solution in time to save his friends?
attributes.description:
After Gum Gum drinks a Potion of Intelligence, he  instantly becomes a genius, the effects seemingly permanent.  But when a powerful dragon attacks the city, will he be able to come up with a solution in time to save his friends? 

If you are seeking more adventures, check out Tales from the Stinky Dragon, the original podcast that inspired Stinky Dragon Adventures.

attributes.title: Show Me the Magic: The Making of Stinky Dragon Adventures - Episode 6
attributes.caption: We're talking all about how we made Stinky Dragon Adventures EPISODE 6! Join the writers and directors, Blaine Gibson and Chris Demarais, composer and writer/editor for Tales from the Stinky Dragon, Micah Risinger, and the bard himself, Bart! We talk about the inspiration for this episode, how we made our villagers, various practical effects and getting to puppet a dragon!
attributes.description: We're talking all about how we made Stinky Dragon Adventures EPISODE 6! Join the writers and directors, Blaine Gibson and Chris Demarais, composer and writer/editor for Tales from the Stinky Dragon, Micah Risinger, and the bard himself, Bart! We talk about the inspiration for this episode, how we made our villagers, various practical effects and getting to puppet a dragon!
attributes.display_title: Show Me the Magic: The Making of Stinky Dragon Adventures - Episode 6

attributes.title: The One-Armed Archer | Episode 7
attributes.caption: While investigating a spree of kidnappings, an evil from Kyborg’s past comes back to haunt him.
attributes.description:

attributes.title: Show Me the Magic: The Making of Stinky Dragon Adventures - Episode 7
attributes.caption: How did we make the most EPIC episode of Stinky Dragon Adventures? Go behind the scenes of episode 7 with our Director of Photography, Kamrin Pester! How did we almost burn our set down? FIND OUT!
attributes.description:
Want to learn how the most EPIC episode of Stinky Dragon Adventures was made? (Blaine paid me $20 to say that)
In this behind the scenes look, we're joined by Director/Writer Blaine Gibson, Director of Photography Kamrin Pester, and Gum Gum! Learn about how we brought a golem city to life, the magic of Unreal Engine, and how we almost burned our set down with a miniature hazer! (Don't tell facilities)
attributes.display_title: Show Me the Magic: The Making of Stinky Dragon Adventures - Episode 7

attributes.title: The Infinight Rescue Mission | Episode 8
attributes.caption: The Interns learn that one of the Infinights is being held captive in Feroz. Can the team come up with a plan to save the Infinights or will the Interns need saving themselves?
attributes.description:
The Interns learn that one of the Infinights is being held captive in Feroz. Can the team come up with a plan to save the Infinights or will the Interns need saving themselves?

If you are seeking more adventures, check out Tales from the Stinky Dragon, the original podcast that inspired Stinky Dragon Adventures.

attributes.title: Show Me the Magic: The Making of Stinky Dragon Adventures - Episode 8
attributes.caption: It's our final episode of Stinky Dragon Adventures, which means it's our final episode of Show Me the Magic! We talk about our season finale with the writers and directors, Blaine Gibson and Chris Demarais, alongside voice of Paralyte and executive producer, Hannah McCarthy, and our guest of honor, Hairless Hutch! We discuss all the details of this Jail break-in, and reflect on an incredible experience making the show!
